verbs.description: Robert De Niro [V: is] apologizing to Canadians for the " idiotic behavior of my president " after the actor launched an expletive at Donald Trump at the Tony awards .

[ARG0: Robert De Niro] is [V: apologizing] [ARG1: to Canadians] [ARG2: for the " idiotic behavior of my president "] [ARGM-TMP: after the actor launched an expletive at Donald Trump at the Tony awards] .

Robert De Niro is apologizing to Canadians for the " idiotic behavior of my president " after [ARG0: the actor] [V: launched] [ARG1: an expletive] [ARG2: at Donald Trump] [ARGM-LOC: at the Tony awards] .
